content: **garland autumn 2024 is the result of the collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** 1 2 **measurements ** 107 5 131 cm / 42¼ 51½ long x 21 5cm / 8½ wide sample shown is size 1 **materials ** garland hobbii x pom pom 70% cotton 30% alpaca 105m / 114yd per 50 g shade terrazzo 3 4 balls **needle ** 3 75mm / us 5 needle 40-60cm / 16-24 length always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauges ** 21 sts & 30 row = 10cm / 4 over pattern on 3 75mm needles after blocking gauge is not crucial but will affect the yardage used **pattern information ** foretoken is knitted sideways beginning with an i-cord tab it consists of an increase section a straight middle section then a decrease section and features little knots that are worked over two row the edges are worked simultaneously in i-cord the length is adjustable depending on the number of repeats worked in the middle section this will change the yardage required **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish 9 dutch 10 1 http //hobbii de/foretoken-textured-kerchief
